pages.text: Some bees are customized with a special pollination effect called $(l)Mutations$(). Mutations allow a bee to convert a block into another block when the bee has $(or)nectar$() and $(or)valid hive$().

A mutation input is the block or block tag being converted. A mutation output is the block the input is being converted to.$(br2)  Each bee can have a customizable number of mutations. By this, we mean that the bee can either mutate one block, ten blocks, or a hundred blocks before it would need to enter the hive and reset the counter.
$(o)It is possible to automate the bee mutations using other mods. We will leave that up to you to figure out.$()$(br2)$(o)$(#ff0000)Inputs and outputs are customized by the pack developer.$()
